author: Vismaya V
title: Metaplanet Hits 85% of Bitcoin Yearly Target, Becomes Fifth-Largest Corporate Holder
description: Tokyo-listed Metaplanet bought 5,419 BTC in a $633 million deal, vaulting into the top five public holders as it advances toward its goals.
content:
In brief
  • Metaplanet acquired 5,419 BTC for $632.53 million, at an average price of $116,724 per coin.
  • Total holdings now stand at 25,555 BTC, valued at approximately $2.91 billion.
